name: BFTableView
summary: With BFTableView you can remove all table view cells identifiers from you code and never ever be mistaken with accessing right cells!
description: Currently you need to hardcode cell identifiers when you use f.e. tableView(cellForRow:AtIndexPath) method and it easy to make a mistake and make your app crash. Now you can just set cell identifier in storyboard with name of cell class and never type it in code anymore.
